text: other - sports Wrestler Nikki Bella is over the moon as she travels with friends to Mexico to celebrate recent engagement to WWE superstar John Cena World Wrestling Entertainment's Total Diva Nikki Bella is all excited about her upcoming marriage to wrestling super star John Cena. Cena, 40, proposed to Bella, 34, at Wrestlemania 33 in April after dating for five years, and the couple recently got engaged. Bella, her sister Brie and a bunch of other Total Divas are in Mexico to celebrate the engagement. ` ` We're going to a five star restaurant because Nicole [ Bella ] only likes nice things,'' Brie said. Nikki Bella'' I have no shame in that. I enjoy the finer things in life,'' said Bella as the group enjoyed dinner by a beach
